QuestData.Title: Entry Into the Citadel
QuestData.Description: This freshly cast mold was to be used to create a key of some sort. From the image engraved on its back, it appears to be related to Hellfire Citadel.$B$BMaybe this could prove to interest to Danath, the force commander at Honor Hold.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Primed Key Mold to Force Commander Danath at Honor Hold in Hellfire Peninsula.
QuestData.RewardText: Could this be? Let me take a closer look at that mold.
